summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances, transactions, and service charges for the period from August 1, 2018, to August 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and interest payments, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.
locations: Deutsche Bank AG New York, NY 10005
St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The beginning balance of the account as of August 1, 2018, was $534,440.04.
The ending balance as of August 31, 2018, was $535,257.07.
An interest payment of $817.03 was credited to the account during the statement period.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF fees for the statement period.
The annual percentage yield earned on the account was 1.81%.
